suppress.notes: "web_project:web" is a generic/placeholder CPE that frequently gets assigned to many Java web artifacts. It is not a meaningful product identifier for our purposes, so we suppress it globally to reduce report noise.

spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf is a Spring Boot starter (3.5.8), not Thymeleaf itself. The actual Thymeleaf library is a different artifact/version (e.g., thymeleaf 3.1.x). Suppress the incorrect CPE mapping for this specific artifact+version.
jakarta.annotation-api is being incorrectly mapped to the generic CPE "oracle:projects" with Low confidence. Suppress this noisy identifier for this specific artifact.
Multiple Jackson artifacts are sometimes mapped to the umbrella CPE "fasterxml:jackson-modules-java8" with Low confidence. Suppress this noisy identifier for the affected Jackson artifacts.
